price: (Nkͻmhyεni), εnnanedane wo kεterεma mpere Adiyisεm no ho (sε wo werε bɛfiri nti).
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
